title: Stackdriver Monitoring
name: Stackdriver Monitoring
description:
Stackdriver Monitoring provides visibility into the performance, uptime, and overall health of cloud-powered applications.

For more information, see cloud.google.com.

  • Homepage
  • API documentation

If it is not already installed, you will also require the gRPC extension. For installation instructions, see here.

NOTE: In addition to the gRPC extension, we recommend installing the protobuf extension for improved performance. For installation instructions, see here.

Installation

$ composer require google/cloud-monitoring
